entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,0,100003}Yes... that's it exactly! You've{F801}found a bottle of wine!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,0,100003}Yes... that's it exactly! You've{F801}found a bottle of wine!{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Hugo snatched the Corked Bottle away{F801}from {F843,0}.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Hugo snatched the Corked Bottle away{F801}from {F843,0}.{F801}

entry.source: {F813,0,100004}{F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,5,1,1}Now I'll not have to endure my wife's{F801}endless nagging as to her wine...{F801}
entry.target: {F813,0,100004}{F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,5,1,1}Now I'll not have to endure my wife's{F801}endless nagging as to her wine...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,5,1,1}{F813,0,100005}I am sure my troubled acquaintance{F801}will be most relieved.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,100006}Permit me to leave you with a token{F801}of gratitude in his stead.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,5,1,1}{F813,0,100005}I am sure my troubled acquaintance{F801}will be most relieved.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,100006}Permit me to leave you with a token{F801}of gratitude in his stead.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,0,100007}{F87B,10,12,1,1}Be certain that you breathe not{F801}a word of this to anyone...{F801}Is that understood?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,0,100007}{F87B,10,12,1,1}Be certain that you breathe not{F801}a word of this to anyone...{F801}Is that understood?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,0,100008}{F87B,10,4,1,1}...Well then, you are free to leave.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,0,100008}{F87B,10,4,1,1}...Well then, you are free to leave.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}I think that's my cue, Master {F843,0}.{F801}{F802}I've confirmed that you've completed{F801}the quest, "Obtain wine."{F801}{F802}Well done.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}I think that's my cue, Master {F843,0}.{F801}{F802}I've confirmed that you've completed{F801}the quest, "Obtain wine."{F801}{F802}Well done.{F801}
